attributes.additional_details:
Today, 9/3/15 I have seen on the IdeasTap website that Peter DeHaan can no longer fund the company from his own charitable company and will cease to be as of 2nd June 2015.

As one of the most prominant arts funding companies out there, no only for funding, but for job opportunities, creative help and a social point for so many artists and creatives, it is a horrible waste to lose such a fantastic resource.

I hope that this petition will raise awareness of what the loss of this company means to the arts industry and hope that some funding can be found to help it remain.
